properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO ,USER_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CONTENT ,COUNT ,CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS='Y'

SELECT n_prev.NOTICE_NO, n_prev.NOTICE_TITLE, 'previous' AS post_position FROM NOTICE n_prev WHERE n_prev.NOTICE_NO = ?
UNION ALL
SELECT n_next.NOTICE_NO, n_next.NOTICE_TITLE, 'next' AS post_position FROM NOTICE n_next WHERE n_next.NOTICE_NO = ?
